summary: BlockDAG - BlockDAG, inspired by Bitcoin and Kaspa, is the world’s most advanced layer 1 blockchain. A cutting-edge Proof-of-Work (PoW) algorithm that delivers industry-leading speeds, unbeatable security, and high decentralization. Built for the future, BlockDAG can power everyday applications to enterprise-grade DeFi protocols. With the power to mine from anywhere, BlockDAG makes crypto mining simple, for everyone.
